article.title: TACOM Awards Paladin Components Contract to BAE Systems Land and Armaments
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: BAE Systems Land and Armaments, Ground Systems Division, has been awarded an $8.7 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the scope line-replaceable units for the Paladin integrated management program. Awarded by the U.S. Tank-Armaments Command Â (TACOM), the company will perform the work with an estimated completion date of June 2012.
